item.title: Warehouse
item.description: Basic terminologies: Dimensions Facts Table and table naming conventions initial 3 letter prefix: DWH, ODS etc. Content: e.g. PRD, SLS Dimension or Fact: D, F Granularity : Department, day/week etc. Suffix as use case: Lookup vs Base Vs Aggregate vs Matrix Naming: data region + dimension_or_fact + content + granularity + usage Column naming: Naming: Attribute or measure + data type Attribute: Price etc. Data type: KEY, ID, DESC Maintenance columns: insert timestamp, update, close, close_dt
